item.title: I have a code, how do i use it?
item.dc:creator: @pur3str_pk2 pur3str pk2
item.description:
@pur3str_pk2 wrote:

That’s wrong, use this 1:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dragon") { addItem(1149,1); addItem(1150,1); addItem(0995,10000000); sendMessage("Got Some dragon and gold!"); }[br][size=1]Posted on: 16:41:37,February 03, 2007[/size][hr]And if they typ ::dragon they get it lol
